## Introduction
Do celltype annotation.


```{r}
library(Seurat)
library(tidyverse)
library(SingleR)
library(patchwork)
library(circlize)
library(ComplexHeatmap)
library(here)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
source(here("plot_theme.R"))
source(here("helper_functions.R"))
set.seed(123)
```

## Automatic cell type labeling


```{r}
notchRNAi <- readRDS(here("output", "NotchRNAi_seurat_TX47.rds"))

# currated table of marker genes based on the literature such as https://www.pnas.org/doi/10.1073/pnas.1916820117 or https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/science.abk2432 or
# https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2211124715006075
marker_table <- data.frame(
    gene = c(
        "betaTry", "epsilonTry", "alphaTry",
        "nub", "Myo31DF",
        "esg", "N", "E(spl)mbeta-HLH", "klu",
        "Dl",
        "Vha100-4", "Vha16-1", "MtnC", "CG17109",
        "pros", "7B2", "IA-2",
        "PGRP-SC1a", "PGRP-SC1b", "Jon65Ai", "Jon65Aii", "Jon66Ci", "Jon66Cii",
        "lambdaTry", "LManVI", "iotaTry", "etaTry", "zetaTry",
        "thetaTry", "Npc2f",
        "Smvt", "ct"
    ),
    celltype = c(
        "aEC", "aEC", "aEC",
        "dEC", "dEC",
        "EB", "EB", "EB", "EB",
        "ISC",
        "Copper\ncells", "Copper\ncells", "Copper\ncells", "Copper\ncells",
        "EE", "EE", "EE",
        "LFC", "LFC", "LFC", "LFC", "LFC", "LFC", "LFC",
        "pEC", "pEC", "pEC", "pEC",
        "mEC", "mEC",
        "MT", "MT"
    )
)


# we still have to run the clustering for TX47, so far only for the integrated one but we are not using that.
notchRNAi <- run_seurat_steps(notchRNAi, include_norm = T, include_leiden = F, include_louvain = T)

Idents(notchRNAi) <- factor(notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1, levels = as.character(0:22))
p <- marker_heatmap(
    seurat = notchRNAi,
    markers = marker_table$gene,
    celltype = marker_table$celltype,
    group.by = "RNA_snn_res.1",
    cap_value = 3
)
p

# based on the heatmap  assign the labels
notchRNAi$celltype_manual <- case_when(
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 0 ~ "ISC",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 1 ~ "EE",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 2 ~ "ISC",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 3 ~ "EB",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 4 ~ "EE",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 5 ~ "ISC",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 6 ~ "ISC",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 7 ~ "EB",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 8 ~ "ISC",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 9 ~ "EB",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 10 ~ "ISC",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 11 ~ "ISC",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 12 ~ "pEC",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 13 ~ "EE",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 14 ~ "EE",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 15 ~ "EB",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 16 ~ "aEC",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 17 ~ "ISC",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 18 ~ "aEC",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 19 ~ "EE",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 20 ~ "aEC",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 21 ~ "Copper",
    notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1 == 22 ~ "pEC",
    T ~ notchRNAi$RNA_snn_res.1
)






notchRNAi$celltype_manual <- factor(notchRNAi$celltype_manual, levels = c("ISC", "EB", "aEC", "Copper", "pEC", "EE", "unk"))

marker_table$celltype <- factor(marker_table$celltype,
    levels = c("ISC", "EB", "dEC", "daEC", "aEC", "Copper", "mEC", "LFC", "pEC", "EE", "MT")
)
saveRDS(notchRNAi, here("output", "notchRNAi_seurat_TX47_annotated.rds"))
```
